message: Invalid user input: empty field detected
description: Input validation failed due to one or more fields being left empty. Please ensure all required fields are properly filled before submission.

message: Unsupported media format: please try another file type
description: The media you provided has an unsupported format for image or video media or corrupted. Kindly upload a compatible file type as listed in the documentation.

message: Image too large: maximum size exceeded
description: Provided image exceeds the allowed size limit (>30MB). Please resize or compress the image before uploading. Visit: https://chsweb.vercel.app/docs?search=Media%20Format

message: Failed to compress image: unknown compression error
description: Image compression process encountered an unexpected issue. Please try again later or verify the image format and quality settings.

message: Video processing failed: unsupported video codec
description: Unable to process video due to an unsupported codec. Use standard encoding formats such as H.264. Refer: https://chsweb.vercel.app/docs?search=videocodec

message: Image to PDF conversion failed: unable to generate PDF
description: Conversion failed during the PDF generation phase. Please ensure the image(s) is in a valid format and try again.

message: Invalid video format: only MP4, AVI, and MOV are supported
description: Uploaded video format is not supported. Please use one of the following: MP4, MKV, AVI, or MOV, WEBM or any other listed formate and size. Visit: https://chsweb.vercel.app/docs?search=Media%20Formate

message: Video too large: maximum size exceeded
description: Provided video exceeds the size limit defined by the system (>400MB). Please compress the video before uploading. Visit: https://chsweb.vercel.app/docs?search=Media%20Format

message: Failed to extract frames from video: unknown error
description: An unexpected error occurred while extracting video frames. Please retry or check if the video format is supported and completing all define rules.

message: Image upload failed: unable to upload image to server
description: An error occurred during the image upload. Please ensure your internet connection is stable or image to base64 string slice converted perfectly, and try again.

message: Video upload failed: unable to upload video to server
description: An error occurred while uploading the video. Please verify your network connection or image to base64 string slice converted perfectly, and try again.

message: Image resizing failed: unable to resize image
description: Image resizing process failed. Please verify image integrity and format before attempting again.

message: Video formatting failed: unable to format video
description: Formatting operation failed on the provided video. Ensure the video format is valid and supported before retrying.

message: Image size under conditions: unable to resize image
description: Unable to resize image due to not meeting the size conditions. Ensure the input meets minimum or maximum image requirements with define format.
Failed to process most recent task, You are in hosted mode but CHS API not connected with system, Try again later or report it
message: Task processing halted: CHS API integration is not active in hosted mode. Check your API bindings or consult documentation here: https://chsweb.vercel.app/docs?search=integration

description: Failed to process most recent task, CHS API refused to connected with this system, Try again later or Check CHS API is working or not manually
message: Request denied: CHS API refused connection with current system setup. Please check the service status or test connectivity manually.
